Articles.Content:
You made your dry dock a carrier, didn't you

I already did that,It was disappointing.No I built something with a hanger three times the volume.

1000 ton carrying capacity(and an extra 1000 for utilities).Room for 2 Cambuks,6 Mjolnirs,A pandora class carrier(maybe 2),100 Broadswords,or to put it better Every Spiritwolf Ship Ever Produced.And that's just in the main hanger,there are two SOK sized side bays which are to house the utilities such as.

Retrieval craft.

Work bots.

Return vehicles.

And a variety of MMUs.The ship also contains crew areas with enough room to house the crew of any ships on board.And all for a reasonable>upside down ?< part count,estimated to be around 3k.It weighs over 4 thousand tons empty.The only thing stopping me from making it bigger was the SPH's height,any wider would have been disproportionate.

To put it best.

http://i.imgur.com/aaRv5Ff.jpg

EDIT:Sorry Zekes I got distracted.Finding that Mechjeb unit is going to be like finding a needle in a farm.

Edited April 16, 2014 by Spartwo
Wow... I'm blown away. You'd win through the lag alone...
It's fine.... but i just cant see the point of that carrier. It's just a big wing in space. wouldn't it be more practical to have a fleet that flew with refueling and repair ships around them?

It's fine.... but i just can't see the point of that carrier. It's just a big wing in space. wouldn't it be more practical to have a fleet that flew with refueling and repair ships around them?

.....Who said anything about practicality?

EDIT:Coming from someone who turned a fighter into a cruiser by accident.

EDITEDIT:Actually It might be,as ships go up in mass less is dedicated to not blowing up.If you compare a Cambuk to a Mjolnir,Cambuks only weigh 50 tons more but are able to carry 3 times as much due to a lesser amount of mass being needed to turn,sustain power,or even stay in one piece.This effect should be exponential.25% Carrying capacity compared to the 15% of a Mjolnir means it may actually be more practical(and insanely cool),not factoring in that all those refueling ships require their own escorts,their own engines,control,sas,power.This results ,most likely,in a fleet weighing more than a supercarrier carrying the ships.Also keep in mind that the fleet won't arrive at the same place,they'll be kilometers apart from one another(as shown by follower mod)

Edited April 16, 2014 by Spartwo

I feel glad I own a gtx 760. Not the rather unusual fx 6300 in my current mobo... weaker than my previous laptop i7.

Should I go for 4k... I have the opportunity to get this for 700 dollars exact... with the 8-10 percent california tax added on top of that. http://www.amazon.com/Samsung-28-Inch-Definition-Monitor-U28D590D/dp/B00IEZGWI2

Another project is the exterminatus cannon I am trying to improve on board a classified vessel of mine, which may be very useful for precision planetary assaults while I am improving my destroyer...

Slight kraken power. Warp heresy.

Edited April 16, 2014 by andrew123
